About.description: I am rarely happier than when spending an entire day programming my computer to perform automatically a task that would otherwise take me a good ten seconds to do by hand.

Experience.name: Wipro Technologies
Experience.description: Started my journey by joining as a WASE student. Worked mainly on two projects, learned a lot. Got a chance to work with different team.It helped me in contiuous learning and career development.

projects.name: Benji Chatbot
projects.description: Benji is a chatbot which can be integrate to any website. It was developed as a college project. Worked as a team with my friends and the made the idea a reality and the  outcome was pretty amazing.
projects.details: Benji is a chatbot developed for my college (CMS). This chatbot is developed using RASA framework , which is a platform that helps us to build ML models. The chatbot was capable of answering most of the queries of user, normal chitchat was also managed to perform, even online payment was possible throught the bot, It can be integrated to the website.

projects.name: JIRA Task Logger
projects.description: Jira task logger is a tool which helps fellow team members to create issues based on an excel sheet. The tool is created with user authentication. Also the parameters for issue creation is configurable.
projects.details: Jira task logger is a tool which helps us to log issues in jira based on a excel sheet. The user can login to the tool to provide the necessary details to create issues in Jira. The parameters for issue creation is configurable. The tool is developed using Python Flask, ReactJS, TailWind CSS, MSSQL.

projects.name: Online Book Stall
projects.description: This website helps fellow writers to sells their books online. Developed using ReactJS, NodeJS, AWS. User can access the website to buy the books. Also integrated an online payment gateway to the website.
projects.details: Online e-commerce web platform to help fellow writers to sell books Developed in ReactJs and PostgressSQL
